Uses of Interface
io.netty5.buffer.api.CompositeBuffer

  • Packages that use CompositeBuffer 
    Package Description
    io.netty5.buffer.api
    Incubating Buffer API, as a proposed alternative to ByteBuf.

    • Uses of CompositeBuffer in io.netty5.buffer.api

      Methods in io.netty5.buffer.api that return CompositeBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CompositeBuffer CompositeBuffer.compact()  
      default CompositeBuffer BufferAllocator.compose()
      Create an empty composite buffer, that has no components.

      Compose the send of a buffer and present them as a single buffer.
      default CompositeBuffer BufferAllocator.compose​(Iterable<Send<Buffer>> sends)
      Compose the given sequence of sends of buffers and present them as a single buffer.

      Create an empty composite buffer, that has no components.
